H0.text: Sand is the component that the finest窶組rained soils are richest in.

H1.text: Humus is what the finest窶組rained soils are richest in.

H2.text: Clay is the component in which the finest窶組rained soils are richest.

H3.text: Iron is the element in which the finest窶組rained soils are richest.

A4.text: Soil separates are specific ranges of particle sizes. The smallest particles are clay particles and are classified as having diameters of less than 0.002 mm.
